description:
You need a Lifesize Cloud subscription to create a videoconference.
		Lifesize Cloud is simply the best way for your entire organization to connect over video when you need to get business done.
		Awesome features, like an easy-to-use interface, screen sharing, calendar integration, chat and audio-calling options will help you drive greater collaboration and communication. 
		Simply put, you will work smarter. And, when connected to our Lifesize Icon video conferencing systems, you get an even better and unique experience in your conference rooms. 
		See for yourself what all the hype is about—download our free, fully featured trial and start video calling in minutes.
summary: Work smarter with award-winning video conferencing that goes everywhere you do.
author: Lifesize
